glsa.title: X.Org X Server: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A format string vulnerability in X.Org X Server may allow local privilege escalation or Denial of Service.

background.p: The X Window System is a graphical windowing system based on a client/server model.

description.p: The "LogVHdrMessageVerb()" function in log.c contains a format string vulnerability.
NOTE: Exposure to this vulnerability is reduced in Gentoo due to X.Org X Server being built with "-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2" by default.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
